Notes

Third Pressing. Reissue including the track "Kissin' Time" and without Warner Bros. distribution 2nd generation blue/dark gray Casablanca label design with a smoking man on the left. Across the bottom of the label is: Manufactured and distributed by Casablanca Records, Inc. / Made In U.S.A. Manufactured and distributed by Casablanca Records, Inc. Engineered and Recorded at Bell Sound Studios, N.Y.C, October 1973 "Firehouse" Fire Engine driven by the magnificent Eddie Solon, Mark Labow and Richie Wise. Bobby claps on "Nothin' To Lose" and Bruce Foster plays piano. "Kissin' Time" published by T.B. Harms Co.
